DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to obtain bladder tissue specimens from patients otherwise undergoing cystectomy for use in research and training of personnel at Tengion, Inc.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Obtain Full Thickness Bladder Tissue From Subjects Undergoing Cystectomy Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 to 90 years and undergoing a cystectomy surgery Willing and able to give signed informed consent Known active infection Known colonization with MRSA or VRE Receipt of blood or blood products for transfusion during the previous 3 months
